price: (64) So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
arabic: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-ajmiʿū kaydakum thumma i'tū ṣaffan waqad aflaḥa al-yawma mani is'taʿlā
